articles.title: China’s secretive space plane has returned to Earth
articles.description: A Chinese “reusable experimental spacecraft” believed to be the country’s secretive space plane has landed back on Earth after more than eight months in orbit – the latest development in a largely covert race between the United States and China to hone such technology.

articles.title: Microsoft Copilot to be integrated into Singapore's legal technology platform
articles.description: The generative AI tool will help streamline legal workflows, but human oversight is still a must.

articles.title: SpaceX’s successful spacewalk, explained
articles.description: The mission tested lots of new technology for future, longer missions.

articles.title: Tech industry titans meet with White House officials to discuss AI energy needs
articles.description: Key Biden Administration personnel met with leaders of the biggest technology companies at the White House on Thursday to discuss new infrastructure needed to support artificial intelligence, sources said.

articles.title: Chinese EV makers face another headwind as Beijing warns on protecting key tech
articles.description: Chinese EV stocks tumble as Beijing urges automakers to keep advanced technology in the nation.
